update_email.update_request_failed.translation: Request to update your email to **{updatedEmail}** has expired.

update_email.confirm_current_email.translation: Confirm the change from your current email at **{userEmail}**. Please check your inbox.

update_email.we_sent_an_email_to_new_ema.translation: We sent an email to **{updatedUserEmail}**. Please check your inbox.

update_email.go_back_to_original_tab.translation: Go back to your original tab.

update_email.go_back_to_original_appname.translation: Go back to your original **{appName}** tab.

update_email.go_back_to_your_original_ta.translation: Go back to your original tab and start the email update flow again

update_email.go_back_to_your_original_ap.translation: Go back to your original **{appName}** tab and start the email update flow again

update_email.failed_to_verify_email_addr.translation: Failed to verify your email address. Please close this window and restart the flow again.

update_email.to_finish_updating_confirm_.translation: To finish updating your email, confirm the change from your current email at **{currentEmail}**

update_email.hold_tight_fixing_issue.translation: Hold tight! We’re fixing an issue.

update_email.currently_working_on_gettin.translation: We're currently working on getting everything back to normal. Please try again soon.
